QuestData.Title: The Burning Throne
QuestData.Description: The time has come, $n, to begin our assault upon Antorus. Everything we have fought for, everything our friends and family have sacrificed, has brought us to this moment.$b$bWe will fire Light's Judgment upon the walls of the accursed citadel and storm their seat of power. We will end the Legion.$b$bAfter all you have done, it is fitting that you have the honor. Speak to Romuul and let us finish our mission.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Grand Artificer Romuul while above the Antoran Wastes to open the way to Antorus.
QuestData.RewardText: After so many years... so many sacrifices... victory is finally within our grasp.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Romuul above the Antoran Wastes
